title: Font Info section
content:
Hello All,

Can anyone suggest some links I could try out to help me understand how to fill in the “Font Info” section in Fontlab once a font set has been designed.

Thanks.

 [‹ Installing AFDKO](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014715/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45236 "Go to previous forum topic") [[Help] Microsoft Word & faux italic/bold/bold italic ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014715/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44144 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Emma Ford

comments.content:
The fontlab manual is the best place to start.

[http://www.fontlab.com/index.php?option=com\_content&task=blogcategory&id...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014715/http:/www.fontlab.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=blogcategory&id=79&Itemid=106 "http://www.fontlab.com/index.php?option=com\_content&task=blogcategory&id=79&Itemid=106")
